explains: adj. 无法阻挡的，无法停止的

sentences.en: The progress of science is unstoppable.
sentences.cn: 科学的进步是无法阻挡的。

sentences.en: The transformation of the news business is unstoppable, and attempts to reverse it are doomed to failure.
sentences.cn: 新闻行业的转型势不可挡，试图扭转它的话注定要失败。

sentences.en: On form, the team was simply unstoppable.
sentences.cn: 若状态良好，这个队简直势不可当。
